ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of DAVID A. BROWN, Q.C., of Kettleby, Ontario, to the position of special advisor to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness and to the President of the Treasury Board as Independent Investigator to hold office during pleasure, effective April 12, 2007, for a term ending on June 15, 2007.
